title: Application Configuration
description: Complete configuration for your application including metadata, data models, automations, and integrations

description.description: A brief description of what your application does
description.title: Application Description
examples: A platform for managing customer orders

icon.description: The icon that represents your application
icon.title: Application Icon

color.description: The primary color theme for your application
color.title: Theme Color

appVersion.description: The version of your application following semantic versioning
appVersion.title: Application Version

schemaVersion.description: The version of the schema format being used
schemaVersion.title: Schema Version

pages.description: List of pages in the application
pages.title: Pages

items.title: Page
items.description: A static page with customizable head and body content

path.description: URL path where the page is accessible
path.title: Page Path
path.help: Must start with / and use lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens

head.description: List of head elements (meta tags, etc.)
head.title: Head Elements

anyOf.title: Head Element
anyOf.description: Meta element configuration for page head section

name.description: Name attribute of the meta tag
name.title: Meta Name

content.title: Meta Content
content.help: The content for this meta tag

anyOf.title: Title Element
anyOf.description: Title element configuration for page head section

content.title: Page Title
content.help: The title that appears in the browser tab and search results

anyOf.title: Script Element
anyOf.description: Script element configuration for page head section

defer.title: Defer Execution
defer.help: Defer script execution until page is parsed

anyOf.title: Style Element
anyOf.description: Style element configuration for page head section

content.description: CSS content for the style tag
content.title: CSS Content
content.help: CSS styles to be applied to the page

media.description: Media query for when to apply styles
media.title: Media Query
media.help: Specify which media/device the styles are for

anyOf.title: Link Element
anyOf.description: Link element configuration for page head section

href.title: Link URL
href.help: URL of the resource to link to

rel.description: Relationship between current document and linked resource
rel.title: Relationship
rel.help: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document

type.description: MIME type of the linked resource
type.title: MIME Type
type.help: MIME type of the linked resource

media.description: Media query for when to load the resource
media.title: Media Query
media.help: Specify which media/device the resource is for

sizes.description: Sizes of the linked resource (for icons)
sizes.title: Sizes
sizes.help: Sizes of the icon (for rel="icon" links)

crossorigin.title: CORS Setting
crossorigin.help: How the element handles cross-origin requests

body.description: List of body elements for page content
body.title: Body Elements

anyOf.title: Body Element
anyOf.description: Custom HTML element configuration for page body section

content.description: HTML content for the body element
content.title: HTML Content
content.help: Custom HTML content to be rendered in the page body

automations.description: List of automation workflows that define business logic and integrations
automations.title: Automations

items.title: Automation Workflow
items.description: A workflow that executes a series of actions when triggered by specific events or conditions

description.description: Detailed description of what this automation does
description.title: Description
examples: Sends a welcome email when a new user signs up
Processes incoming orders and updates inventory

editUrl.description: URL to edit this automation in an external tool
editUrl.title: Edit URL

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: The event or condition that starts this automation

anyOf.title: HTTP
anyOf.description: The HTTP trigger is a trigger that is triggered by an HTTP request

anyOf.title: POST
anyOf.description: The POST HTTP trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a POST request

anyOf.title: GET
anyOf.description: The GET HTTP trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a GET request

anyOf.title: Database
anyOf.description: The database trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a database event

anyOf.title: Record Created
anyOf.description: The Record Created trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a record being created

anyOf.title: Record Updated
anyOf.description: The Record Updated trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a record being updated

anyOf.title: Schedule
anyOf.description: The Schedule trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a schedule event

anyOf.title: Cron Time
anyOf.description: The Cron Time trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a cron time

anyOf.title: Integration Trigger
anyOf.description: The integration trigger is the event that triggers the automation

anyOf.title: Calendly
anyOf.description: The Calendly trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a Calendly event

anyOf.title: Invite Created
anyOf.description: The Calendly invite created trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a invite created event

anyOf.title: Airtable
anyOf.description: The Airtable trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a Airtable event

anyOf.title: Invite Created
anyOf.description: The Calendly invite created trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a invite created event

anyOf.title: LinkedIn Ads
anyOf.description: The LinkedIn Ads trigger is triggered by LinkedIn lead events

anyOf.title: New Lead Gen Form Response
anyOf.description: Triggered when a new LinkedIn Lead Gen Form response is created

sponsoredAccountId.title: LinkedIn Sponsored Account ID
sponsoredAccountId.description: Required for sponsored lead forms (leadType: SPONSORED)

leadType.description: Type of lead form. SPONSORED requires sponsoredAccountId

anyOf.title: Facebook
anyOf.description: The Facebook trigger is triggered by Facebook lead events

anyOf.title: New Lead
anyOf.description: Triggered when a new Facebook Lead Ad response is created

pageId.title: Facebook Page ID
pageId.description: The ID of the Facebook page with lead forms

appId.title: Facebook App ID
appId.description: Your Facebook App ID from the developer console

appSecret.title: Facebook App Secret
appSecret.description: Your Facebook App Secret from the developer console

verifyToken.title: Webhook Verify Token
verifyToken.description: Security token for webhook verification (auto-generated if not provided)

actions.description: Sequence of actions to execute when triggered
actions.title: Actions

tables.description: Database tables that store your application data
tables.title: Data Tables

items.title: Data Table
items.description: A database table definition with its fields and structure

name.title: Table Name
name.help: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores. Must start with a letter.

fields.description: List of fields/columns in this table
fields.title: Table Fields

items.title: Field
items.description: The field is a field of a table

anyOf.title: Text Field
anyOf.description: The text field is a field that can contain a text

anyOf.title: Checkbox Field
anyOf.description: The checkbox field is a field that can contain a checkbox

anyOf.title: Single Select Field
anyOf.description: The single select field is a field that can contain a single select

anyOf.title: Single Attachment Field
anyOf.description: The single attachment field is a field that can contain a single attachment

forms.description: User interface forms for data collection and interaction
forms.title: Forms

items.title: User Form
items.description: A form for collecting user input with customizable fields and actions

path.description: URL path where the form is accessible
path.title: Form Path
path.help: Must start with / and use lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens

action.description: API endpoint or action to handle form submission
action.title: Submit Action
action.help: The endpoint that will process the form data

description.description: Help text or instructions for the form
description.title: Form Description
description.placeholder: Describe the purpose of this form
examples: Fill out this form to get in touch with our team
Please provide your details to create an account

inputs.description: List of form fields for user input
inputs.title: Form Fields

items.title: Input
items.description: The input is a input of a form

anyOf.title: Text Input
anyOf.description: The text input is a input that can contain a text

anyOf.title: Checkbox Input
anyOf.description: The checkbox input is a input that can contain a checkbox

anyOf.title: Select Input
anyOf.description: The select input is a input that can contain a select

anyOf.title: Attachment Input
anyOf.description: The attachment input is a input that can contain a attachment

successMessage.description: Message displayed after successful form submission
successMessage.title: Success Message
examples: Thank you! We will get back to you soon.
Your account has been created successfully!

connections.description: External service connections and API integrations
connections.title: Connections

items.description: Connect your application to external services like Calendly, Airtable, Google, LinkedIn, or Facebook
items.title: Service Connection

anyOf.title: Calendly
anyOf.description: The Calendly connection is a connection to the Calendly API

anyOf.title: Airtable
anyOf.description: The Airtable connection is a connection to the Airtable API

anyOf.title: Google Gmail
anyOf.description: The Google Gmail connection is a connection to the Google Gmail API

anyOf.title: Google Sheets
anyOf.description: The Google Sheets connection is a connection to the Google Sheets API

anyOf.title: LinkedIn Ads
anyOf.description: The LinkedIn Ads connection is a connection to the LinkedIn Ads API

anyOf.title: Facebook Ads
anyOf.description: The Facebook Ads connection is a connection to the Facebook Ads API

anyOf.title: Notion
anyOf.description: The Notion connection is a connection to the Notion API

anyOf.title: Qonto
anyOf.description: The Qonto connection is a connection to the Qonto API

buckets.description: Storage buckets for files and media assets
buckets.title: Storage Buckets

items.title: Storage Bucket
items.description: A storage container for organizing and managing files and media assets

id.description: Unique identifier for the storage bucket
id.title: Bucket ID

name.description: Name of the storage bucket for organizing files
name.title: Bucket Name
name.help: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Must start and end with a letter or number.

__schema0.title: JSON Schema
__schema0.description: The JSON Schema is a schema that describes the structure of the data

__schema1.title: Action
__schema1.description: The action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: HTTP
anyOf.description: The HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: GET
anyOf.description: The GET HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: POST
anyOf.description: The POST HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Response
anyOf.description: The response HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Code
anyOf.description: The code action is a code action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Run Typescript
anyOf.description: The run typescript code action is a code action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Run Javascript
anyOf.description: The run javascript code action is a code action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Filter
anyOf.description: The Filter action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Only continue if
anyOf.description: The Only continue if filter action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Split into paths
anyOf.description: The Split into paths filter action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Calendly
anyOf.description: The Calendly action is a action that is used to interact with the Calendly API

anyOf.title: List Webhook Subscriptions
anyOf.description: The Calendly list webhook subscriptions action is a action that lists the webhook subscriptions for a given organization

anyOf.title: Get Event Type
anyOf.description: The Calendly get event type action is a action that gets the event type for a given uuid

anyOf.title: Airtable
anyOf.description: The Airtable action is a action that is used to interact with the Airtable API

anyOf.title: List Webhook Subscriptions
anyOf.description: The Calendly list webhook subscriptions action is a action that lists the webhook subscriptions for a given organization

anyOf.title: Google Sheets
anyOf.description: The Google Sheets action is a action that is used to interact with the Google Sheets API

anyOf.title: Append values to a Google Sheets
anyOf.description: The Google Sheets append values action is a action that appends values to a Google Sheets spreadsheet

anyOf.title: Google Gmail
anyOf.description: The Google Gmail action is a action that is used to interact with the Google Gmail API

anyOf.title: Send an email
anyOf.description: The Google Gmail send email action is a action that sends an email

anyOf.title: LinkedIn Ads
anyOf.description: Actions to interact with LinkedIn Ads APIs

anyOf.title: Create Lead Notification Subscription (Owner Level)
anyOf.description: Creates a LinkedIn Lead Notification subscription at owner (organization) level.

anyOf.title: Fetch Lead Notification Subscriptions (Owner Level)
anyOf.description: Lists LinkedIn lead notification subscriptions for an organization.

anyOf.title: Get Single Lead Form Response
anyOf.description: Retrieves a single LinkedIn Lead Form Response by its ID.

leadResponseId.title: Lead Response ID
leadResponseId.description: The unique identifier for the lead form response (e.g., urn:li:leadFormResponse:123456)

anyOf.title: Facebook Ads
anyOf.description: Actions to interact with Facebook Ads APIs

anyOf.title: List App Subscriptions
anyOf.description: Lists subscriptions configured on the Facebook App

anyOf.title: Get LeadGen
anyOf.description: Retrieves lead generation data using the leadgen_id from webhook

leadgenId.title: Leadgen ID
leadgenId.description: The leadgen_id from Facebook webhook data

anyOf.title: Notion
anyOf.description: The Notion action is used to interact with the Notion API

anyOf.title: Create Page
anyOf.description: Creates a new page in Notion

parent.description: Parent of the new page (database, page, or workspace)

anyOf.title: Get Page
anyOf.description: Retrieves a page from Notion

pageId.description: The ID of the page to retrieve

anyOf.title: Update Page
anyOf.description: Updates properties, icon, cover, or archived status of a Notion page

pageId.description: The ID of the page to update

anyOf.title: Delete Page
anyOf.description: Deletes (archives) a page in Notion

pageId.description: The ID of the page to delete (archive)

anyOf.title: List Pages
anyOf.description: Lists pages from a Notion database

databaseId.description: The ID of the database to query

anyOf.title: Search Pages
anyOf.description: Searches for pages in Notion

anyOf.title: Qonto
anyOf.description: The Qonto action is used to interact with the Qonto API

anyOf.title: Create Client
anyOf.description: Creates a new client in Qonto

anyOf.title: Create Invoice
anyOf.description: Creates a new invoice in Qonto

client_id.description: ID of the client for this invoice

anyOf.title: Database
anyOf.description: The Database action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Create record
anyOf.description: Create a record in a database table
